original: Vajravidāraṇī
translated: Vajra Penetration

original: namo bhagavatya āryamahāvajravidāraṇāyai /
analyzed: namaḥ bhagavatyaḥ ārya mahā vajra vidāraṇāyai
translated: Homage to the Blessed Noble Great Vajra Penetration.

original: namo buddhāya //
analyzed: namaḥ buddhāya
translated: Homage to the Buddha.

original: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān vajreṣu viharati sma /
analyzed: evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān vajreṣu viharati sma
translated: Thus have I heard. At one time the Blessed One was dwelling in the vajras.

original: sarvaśarīraṃ vajramayam adhiṣṭhāya vajrapāṇiś ca buddhānubhāvena vajrasamādhiṃ samāpannam /
analyzed: sarva śarīram vajra mayam adhiṣṭhāya vajrapāṇiḥ ca buddha anubhāvena vajra samādhim samāpannam
translated: Having consecrated his entire body as vajra, Vajrapani, by the Buddha's power, entered the vajra samadhi.

original: tato vajrapāṇir buddhānubhāvena sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānāc ca sarvabodhisatvādhiṣṭhānāc ca mahākrodhasaṃbhūtaṃ vajrasārapadaṃ bhāṣate sma //
analyzed: tatas vajrapāṇiḥ buddha anubhāvena sarva buddha adhiṣṭhānāt ca sarva bodhisatva adhiṣṭhānāt ca mahā krodha saṃbhūtam vajrasāra padam bhāṣate sma
translated: Then Vajrapani, by the Buddha's power and the empowerment of all Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, spoke the vajra essence mantra born from great wrath:

original: acchedyam abhedyaṃ satyadṛḍhasthiraṃ sarvatā pratihataṃ sarvasatvavidāraṇakaraṃ sarvasatvasādhanakaraṃ🔽sarvavidyācchedanakaraṃ sarvavidyāstambhanakaraṃ sarvakarmavidhvaṃsanakaraṃ sarvakarmavidāraṇakaraṃ
analyzed: acchedyam abhedyam satya dṛḍha sthiram sarva tā pratihatam sarva satva vidāraṇa karam sarva satva sādhana karam  sarva vidyā chedana karam sarva vidyā stambhana karam sarva karma vidhvaṃsana karam sarva karma vidāraṇa karam
translated: Indestructible, unbreakable, firmly established in truth, repelling everything, causing the destruction of all beings, accomplishing all beings,🔽cutting off all knowledge, paralyzing all knowledge, destroying all actions, tearing apart all actions,

original: sarvagrahotsādanakaraṃ sarvagrahavimokṣaṇakaraṃ sarvabhūtāpakarṣaṇakaraṃ sarvavidyāmantrakarāyanakaram
analyzed: sarva graha utsādana karam sarva graha vimokṣaṇa karam sarva bhūta apakarṣaṇa karam sarva vidyā mantra kara ayana karam
translated: destroying all planets, liberating from all planets, drawing forth all spirits, making all knowledge mantras ineffective,

original: asiddhānāṃ siddhakaraṃ siddhānāṃ cāpi vināśanakaraṃ sarvakarmapadaṃ sarvasatvānāṃ
analyzed: asiddhānām siddha karam siddhānām ca api vināśana karam sarva karma padam sarva satvānām
translated: It accomplishes the unattained and destroys the attained, the word of action for all beings,

original: rakṣakaraṃ śāntikaṃ puṣṭikaṃ sarvasatvānāṃ stambhanakaraṃ sarvasatvānāṃ mohanakaram
analyzed: rakṣa karam śāntikam puṣṭikam sarva satvānām stambhana karam sarva satvānām mohana karam
translated: it protects, pacifies, and nourishes all beings, it paralyzes and bewilders all beings.

original: idaṃ mantramahābalaṃ sarvabuddhānubhāvena yakṣendro vajrapāṇiḥ prabhāṣate sma //
analyzed: idam mantra mahābalam sarva buddha anubhāvena yakṣa indraḥ vajrapāṇiḥ prabhāṣate sma
translated: By the power of all the Buddhas, the Lord of Yakshas, Vajrapani, spoke this great and powerful mantra:

original: namo ratnatrayāya /
analyzed: namaḥ ratnatrayāya
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels.

original: namo caṇḍavajrapāṇaye mahāyakṣasenāpataye //
analyzed: namaḥ caṇḍa vajrapāṇaye mahā yakṣa senāpataye
translated: Homage to Chandavajrapani, the great general of the Yakshas.

original: tadyathā / taṭa trotaya sphuṭa sphoṭaya ghuṇa ghuṇāpaya sarvasatvāni
analyzed: tat yathā taṭa trotaya sphuṭa sphoṭaya ghuṇa sarva satvāni
translated: Thus: Tat trotaya sphuta sphotya ghuna ghunapayas sarvasattvanam.

original: bodhaya saṃbodhaya trasa soṃtrāsaya sarvabuddhābodhinī kūṭa kūṭaya
analyzed: bodhaya saṃbodhaya trasa soṃ trāsaya sarva buddha abodhinī kūṭa kūṭaya
translated: Bodhaya sambodhaya trasasontrasaya sarvabuddhabodhinikuto kutaya.

original: saṃkuṭaya sarvaśatrūn ghaṭa saṃghaṭaya sarvavidyāvajra sphoṭaya vajra kaṭa
analyzed: saṃkuṭaya sarva śatrūn ghaṭa saṃghaṭaya sarva vidyā vajra sphoṭaya vajra kaṭa
translated: Samkutaya sarva shatrun ghatasanghataya sarva vidya vajra sphotya vajra kat.

original: vajra maṭa vajra pratha vajra tatha sahanīlavajra suvajrāya svāhā //
analyzed: vajra su vajrāya svāhā
translated: Vajra mat vajra pratha vajra tatha sahnil vajra suvajraya svaha.

original: oṃ he phalini gṛhṇa kuru mili curu kara vajravijayāya svāhā //
analyzed: om he phalini gṛhṇa kuru mili curu kara vajra vijayāya svāhā
translated: Om he phalini grhna kuru mili curu kara vajra vijaya svaha.

original: oṃ vajrakilikilmiṣa svāhā //
analyzed: om vajra kili kilmiṣa svāhā
translated: Om vajra kili kilmisha svaha.

original: oṃ kaṭa maṭa raṭa moṭaya pramoṭanāya svāhā //
analyzed: om kaṭa maṭa raṭa moṭaya pramoṭanāya svāhā
translated: Om kat mat rat mottaya pramoṭanāya svāhā.

original: oṃ cara vicara husara māraya vajravidāraṇāya svāhā //
analyzed: om cara vicara husara māraya vajra vidāraṇāya svāhā
translated: Om cara vicar husara maraya vajravidāraṇāya svāhā.

original: oṃ chinda bhinda mahākilikilāya svāhā //🔽oṃ bandha krodhavajrāya kilikilāya svāhā //
analyzed: om chinda bhinda mahākilikilāya svāhā  om bandha krodha vajrāya kilikilāya svāhā
translated: Om chinda bhinda mahākilikilāya svāhā.🔽Om bandha krodhavajra kilākilāya svāhā.

original: oṃ culu caṇḍāli kilikilāya svāhā //
analyzed: om culu caṇḍāli kilikilāya svāhā
translated: Om chulu caṇḍāli kilākilāya svāhā.

original: oṃ trāsaya kilikilāya svāhā //
analyzed: om trāsaya kilikilāya svāhā
translated: Om trāsayā kilākilāya svāhā.

original: oṃ hara vajradharāya svāhā //
analyzed: om hara vajradharāya svāhā
translated: Om hara vajradharāya svāhā.

original: oṃ prahara vajraprabhañjanāya svāhā //
analyzed: om prahara vajraprabhañjanāya svāhā
translated: Om prahara vajraprabhañjanāya svāhā.

original: ṛddhisthiravajra śrutisthiravajra pratisthiravajra mahāvajra apratihatavajra amoghavajra ehy ehi vajra śīghraṃ vajrāya svāhā //
analyzed: ṛddhi sthira vajra śruti sthira vajra pratisthira vajra mahā vajra apratihata vajra amogha vajra ehi ehi vajra śīghram vajrāya svāhā
translated: Ṛddhisthiravajra śrutisthiravajra pratisthiravajra mahāvajra apratihata-vajra amogha-vajra ehyehi vajra śīghraṃ vajrāya svāhā.

original: aṃ dhara dhiri dhuru huṃ huṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
analyzed: aṃ dhara dhiri dhuru hum hum phaṭ phaṭ svāhā
translated: Aṃ dhara dhiri dhuru huṃ huṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: oṃ namaḥ samantabuddhānāṃ /🔽oṃ mahābala kaṭa vegatare acale maṇḍala māraya ativajre mahāvegaraṇapūjite jvala ṭi ṭi ṭi ṭi ṭi //
analyzed: om namaḥ samanta buddhānām  om mahā bala kaṭa vegatare acale maṇḍala māraya ati vajre mahā vegaraṇa pūjite jvala ṭi ṭi ṭi ṭi ṭi
translated: Om, homage to all the Buddhas.🔽Om mahābala kaṭa vega-tara acale maṇḍala māraya ati-vajre mahāvega-raṇa-pūjite jvala ṭi ṭi ṭi ṭi ṭi.

original: nara daha dhara vajra tejovati tiri bandha mahābala vajra vajrāṅkuśa jvālaya svāhā //
analyzed: nara daha dhara vajra tejovati tiri bandha mahā bala vajra vajrāṅkuśa jvālaya svāhā
translated: Nara daha dhara vajra tejovati tiri bandha mahābala vajra-aṅkuśa jvālāya svāhā.

original: oṃ namo ratnatrayāya /
analyzed: om namaḥ ratnatrayāya
translated: Om, homage to the Three Jewels.

original: namaś caṇḍavajrapāṇaye mahāyakṣasenāpataye //
analyzed: namaḥ caṇḍa vajrapāṇaye mahā yakṣa senāpataye
translated: Homage to Caṇḍa-vajra-pāṇi, the great general of the yakṣas.

original: tadyathā / oṃ hara vajra matha vajra dhuru vajra dhara vajradharāya vajraripuna vajra cchinda vajra bhinda vajra huṃ phaṭ //
analyzed: tat yathā om hara vajra matha vajra dhuru vajra dhara vajradharāya vajraripuna vajra chinda vajra bhinda vajra hum phaṭ
translated: Thus: Om, seize, vajra, grind, vajra, crush, vajra, hold, vajra, to the vajra-holder, vajra-enemy, cut, vajra, pierce, vajra, hum phat.

original: oṃ namaś caṇḍavajrapāṇaye mahākrodhāya huru vajra bandha hara amṛte huṃ phaṭ svāhā //
analyzed: om namaḥ caṇḍa vajrapāṇaye mahākrodhāya huru vajra bandha hara amṛte hum phaṭ svāhā
translated: Om, homage to Caṇḍa-vajra-pāṇi, the great wrathful one, hulu vajra-bond, seize, nectar, hum phat, svāhā.

original: hṛadayamantraḥ //
analyzed: hṛd daya mantraḥ
translated: The heart mantra.

original: oṃ namo ratnatrayāya //
analyzed: om namaḥ ratnatrayāya
translated: Om, homage to the Three Jewels.

original: namaś caṇḍavajrapāṇaye huru tiṣṭha bandha amṛte huṃ phaṭ svāhā //
analyzed: namaḥ caṇḍa vajrapāṇaye huru tiṣṭha bandha amṛte hum phaṭ svāhā
translated: Homage to Caṇḍa-vajra-pāṇi, hulu, remain, bind, nectar, hum phat, svāhā.

original: iti śrī vajravidāraṇā nāma dhāraṇīhṛdayopahṛdayaṃ mūlasūtraṃ samāptam //
analyzed: iti śrī vajravidāraṇā nāma dhāraṇī hṛdaya upahṛdayam mūlasūtram samāptam
translated: Thus, the heart of the dhāraṇī called Vajra-vidāraṇā, the root sūtra, is complete.
